name: Daniel'sdad

”Alexa, ask daniel's dad to tell me the lunch menu for today”
”Alexa, launch daniel's dad”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daniel's dad
des:
As parents we need to know what's for lunch today, such that we can decide if we should pack something else instead.
Wise words are provided by They Said So, see more at https://theysaidso.com/api
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
